General.Name: NevGold Corp
General.Description: NevGold Corp. engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties. The company explores for gold and silver polymetallic deposits. It owns a 100% interest in the Limousine Butte and Cedar Wash projects in Nevada, the United States; and the Ptarmigan silver polymetallic project located in British Columbia, Canada. It also has an option to acquire 100% interest in the Nutmeg Mountain Gold Project located in Idaho. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 250 ? 200 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3L6
